name.ja: ジョインテック・グレートウォール

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 7 or higher monster face-up while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher EARTH Attribute Machine Type monster on your field.

effect.en: This turn, up to 3 face-up EARTH Attribute Machine Type monsters on your field gain 300 ATK and cannot be destroyed by battle.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
